Context:
The first day that students can start to withdraw from courses and start registering for the 2023-2024 academic year is not directly specified in the text. However, it is mentioned that students should check georgebrown.ca/current-students/important-dates for the full list of Important Dates for the academic year. Therefore, the factual information from this text is as follows:

1. Students can find the important dates for the 2023-2024 academic year at georgebrown.ca/current-students/important-dates.
2. Registration start times and course dates and times are subject to change without notice.
3. Students are advised to check back frequently for the latest information, particularly before the start of classes.
